name: QEYS
description:
Waiting for a download to finish? Maybe impatient for an email or a phone call?
Are you feeling slow and in need of something to WAKE YOU UP?

Play Q E Y S. It is the perfect fix for all of these momentary problems. A pick-me-up you can pull up anytime you want.
All it takes is typing "qeys" into the command-line and readying yourself to game with nothing but one key for each finger on your hand.

Features:

  • Solid, quick and fun arcade gameplay
  • A portable and quick-to-boot executable
  • Gameplay that is sure to accelerate you
  • Portable save files to keep track of user highscores and boards
  • Custom boards for you to create with your own rules and scores
  • Challenging built-in boards ready for playing
  • A desk tool for stress relief and enjoyment
  • Ability to choose the terminal emulator to your liking and run as many instances of the game as you wish

Master the different Cards and succeed them as fast as you can before time runs out! Then boast about your hard-earned scores and ratios with your friends. Good luck!

QEYS is a POSIX game created by H. Novalis.
